content: the feet after making the muzzle completed body ears slip_stitch onto the first loop chain 3 treble_crochet decrease one leg on each loop chain 3 slip_stitch onto the second loop repeat for the second ear butt with pink yarn single_crochet in each loop of the starting chain tie off 10sc in the picture below the left butt is made with caron simply soft and the right is made with red heart with love face use black yarn or embroidery floss with a needle to add the mouth nose and eyes top loop make a chain 10-12 and leave a tail on each end to attach the button later thread the chain through the double_crochet portion of the bag holder leave two double_crochet in front and thread the chain under the next two double_crochet continue going over and under sets of two double crochets until you have gone all the way around for upright ears only do five rounds between the bottom and top paws instead of six and add an extra row of single_crochet right before the double_crochet round switch to 3 single_crochet between the blo single_crochet stitches in round 17 tcr3tog two on one loop one on the other to make the ears and pull the tails between the tops of the double crochet round with the two ear tips four stitches apart this prevents the ears from interfering with the drawstring to add a collar blo single_crochet for row 12 create a chain long enough to go around the bag holder and sew it onto the loops this is time consuming and annoying but doing a single round of a different color doesn t look good
